snippet: Macy’s announced that its chief merchandising officer, Jeffrey Gennette, would become the company’s new president, taking a title the chief executive held until Monday.
abstract: Macy's announces that its chief merchandising officer, Jeffrey Gennette, will become company's new president; title of president had been previously held by Macy's chief executive, Terry J Lundgren.
lead_paragraph: Macy’s announced that its chief merchandising officer, Jeffrey Gennette, would become the company’s new president, taking a title the chief executive held until Monday.

headline.main: Macy’s C.E.O. Gives Up Title of President
headline.print_headline: Macy’s C.E.O. Gives Up Title of President
